description: Comedian John O'Brien teaches a range of effective and proven memory techniques for unlocking your Rainman memory. This memory training course takes users through a number of different memory skills, putting them to use in a variety of real-world scenarios. Filmed with a live studio audience, John demonstrates these useful techniques and skills to improve your memory in everything from remembering a multitude of names at once, to long numbers to different skills such as mind mapping and improving your state of mind. The course features 28 full video lectures, taught through 8 different topic sections and comes complete with study and guidance notes.
title: Remember Remember: A Comedians Guide To Memory Training
instructors: Comedian/Memory Training Expert John O'Brien, Inner Ear
